website_summaries.verdict: With numerous responses and a reasonable price, this FurReal Friend is a great choice for boys and girls who love interactive toys.
pros: Bold colors, bright eyes, and intriguing interactions make kids eager to play with this plushy triceratops
Jumps when hands are waved in front of him, and sits when patted on the head
cons: Some dinosaurs arrived with dead batteries
Topper is prone to toppling over during interactions

customer_reviews.title: Very Interactive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves dinosaurs, so this Triceratops was an easy buy. It plays lots of sounds and is very interactive. It keeps her entertained and is another great addition to her many other dinosaurs. If you found this review helpful, please click the ‘Helpful’ button below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mick04u

customer_reviews.title: Autistic Son loves it and Mom loves the smiles!!!
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son absolutely loves this triceratops. I have never seen him smile so much. Worth every penny spent to bring joy to his face!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My only complaint is it came on so it talked all the time. I had to disassemble to whole box to get it out to shut it off so my daughter won’t guess what it is through the wrapping paper until Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Denielle

customer_reviews.title: Very adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter I know she is going to be one happy child! Only thing that I didn’t like is that the toy is shipped in demo mode which means it makes noises as soon as it feels any movement, in order to shut it off you have to actually open the whole package which I don’t want to do as it is a present
customer_reviews.author: leticia

customer_reviews.title: arrived dead, had to replace batteries
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase for the price on amazon for $25 when walmart carries it for $50, but it arrived dead and needing new batteries from the start. Luckily, it fixed it because I didn't want to worry about replacement and shipping and all that. Otherwise, the toy is fun, cute and the second one I have bought for my nephew (I got the T-Rex one for his birthday). Hopefully he likes it! (I don't think he'll mind it's a little girly looking unless my brother says something lol).
customer_reviews.author: Lydia VonSacken

customer_reviews.title: Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: This toy falls over even when on a flat surface from all the hopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves dinosaurs. I was super excited to get her this for Christmas. I got for $20, so can’t complain too much. But I still feel that it doesn’t do very much to be an exciting toy. It does move up and down, and make cute noises. But that’s it. It was played with on Christmas Day and has been left alone since then. And the two pieces that came with it are cute, but easy to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan H.

customer_reviews.title: It arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with its neck twisted around several times and the head was completely broken off the neck. The only thing keeping the head on was the twisted up fabric. Very disappointed in this. Definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R

customer_reviews.title: So cute and so fun. Very talkative.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is super fun and super cute, it’s just hard to keep quiet both before and after it’s been wrapped as a gift! I “blindfolded” the Dino with rolled up tissue paper, since I think the interactive sensors are in its eyes, and that worked perfectly. As soon as the wrapping paper was off and the blindfold was removed, the Dino worked great. She was so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with corroded batteries, stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with dead batteries that had started to corrode. Cleaned connections best I could and put new batteries.. worked ok on and off. Was a Christmas gift, and now doesn’t work:( little one still likes the look of it but the fact it no longer functions is disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: laura marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This dinosaur is very cute and fun to play with. My 2 year old loves it and so do his older siblings. I originally bought two of them. One for my son and one for my friend’s son for his birthday. Ours works well, unfortunately the one my friend received wasn’t working as well. I contacted Amazon and they were wonderful. They apologized for the issue and immediately sent my friend’s son a new one. I would definitely buy again. We now have two very happy dinosaur loving kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Bree L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It's cute looking, doesn't do much. Was shipped in demo mode and was dead on delivery so had to replace the batteries before I could wrap for Christmas morning which was a pain. Overall its decent, just don't have high standards for entertainment purposes lol.
customer_reviews.author: BnC M

customer_reviews.title: Good clearance gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is just okay. I’d be upset if I paid over thirty for it. It doesn’t do much of anything except move up and down and make sounds. We have about six or seven other Fur Real friends and they are much better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Strange body design
customer_reviews.text: If you haven’t seen one in person they are over priced for what they are. I love the Fur Real line but these aren’t the same. They look like a pillowcase places over the frame of the animal. The face and sounds are so cute, the body is colorful but not great due to this odd design of this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Carli Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Turn it off before shipping
customer_reviews.text: This thing is adorable and my son loves it, please turn it off before shipping the thing made so much noise wrapped under the tree it was hard to keep it a surprise, you can't turn it off without fully unboxing it and that ruins the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Cutest fureal pet
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cutest fureal pets I’ve seen ... it was a Christmas gift to my daughter and she absolutely loves it ... for the price it’s adorable and so cute how she jumps up and down and love all her sounds ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great toy for $25
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the first one, got a defected toy. Second one... well, it's cute. But works with stops. Purhased less than 3 months ago for $46 and now it's 25 - that's pretty upsetting :-(
customer_reviews.author: katt321

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my nephew as a friend to the T-Rex one I got last year he carries them both all over takes them everywhere. Definitely pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: britch01

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old and he loved it. The sounds are adorable and he loves that it moves every time he pets it's head. I love the fur real products and plan on buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but was disappointed. It does not do much and doesn't interact with the included accessories. Does the same thing over and over. Toddler wasn't interested. Glad I got it on sale. Not worth the MSRP
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Beckett

customer_reviews.title: So much cute fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends two year old daughter who loves dinosaurs. It’s priceless! She loves her baby “tippy” you do have to put her to bed at night with the batteries off but your little won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our granddaughter for her birthday and it is now one of her favorite toys. If you let your little one take it to bed, be sure to turn it off first! (;
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The neck wasn’t supported correctly. It may have broke in transit and whenever I tried reaching out to the company it was impossible. The toy arrived defective.
customer_reviews.author: SxyNessa

customer_reviews.title: It’s hopping fun
customer_reviews.text: My son fell in love with it. Makes noise in the box so if it’s a surprise don’t try to open it around the child. Worth the money. He has his own collection.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughter's favorite gift she got for her 6th birthday. I thought it would do more than it does, but she was thrilled with her new "pet dinosaur."
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made toy that my granddaughters love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these when they were on the deal of the day because the price was great compared to the normal retail price. My six-year-old and eight-year-old granddaughters both loved these Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: The demo batteries were almost dead when we got it. I out 4 new batteries in and it seemed to work except when it went to sleep you had to turn it off and back on to start working. It did not work as advertised for me. We are going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Short

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I seen this in stores and fell in love with it. I had to pass it up at the time but a few weeks later Amazon had select toys on sale and this was among them. It's perfect. The dino started making cute sounds to me as soon as I opened the box. This is going to be an amazing gift.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Cute Dino toy to teach fun and care ;)
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this Dino interactive toy. He cares for it and feeds it the treats. Takes it everywhere. It’s cute and not annoying like many other toys!!
customer_reviews.author: Love2shopchic

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a stupid toy. The novelty wore off quickly as it really doesn't do anything. It's just repetitive sounds and motions. My 3 year old granddaughter got bored with it within a few hours, and hasn't touched it since.
customer_reviews.author: Micksdad

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute! Got this as a gift for a little girl and it was super adorable and everyone loved it. It is a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Best toy
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my sons fav Christmas gift. He sleeps with this toy! He simply turns it off and they both go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy. Didn’t find it to be a interactive as expected. The toy doesn’t really do much. A bit of a disappointment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Parent of Two

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is poor
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy, he was so excited when he opened it. My middle rating is do to the batteries being dead when getting it. My son had to wait til we got new ones and when we did it worked for many 15-20 mins then it stopped. It's a super cute dino just the batteries dont last long.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed as I have now ordered two of these dinosaurs that don’t work. We have changed the batteries. It will say one line but no longer responds. I was hopeful with the second one we ordered (because my daughter was so disappointed on Christmas with the first) but after a few minutes it stopped working too. It seems to have a short or something.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my granddaughter..this thing is super cute and adorable to the point I want one for myself ..not to mention my dogs were super entertained by this thing....and my granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's not as soft as you think it is, most of the actions are similar so the variationa not actually as many as claimed
customer_reviews.author: Asad Hafeez

customer_reviews.title: Cuuuute!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old loves this thing! She begged for it and plays with it alot! It is absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Xero

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute the kids love it They call it there pet and play with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Keri Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Need my little sweethearts Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very pleased I was a hero at Christmas One of the biggest hugs ever
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone  A Heath

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute and worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I found it at kohl’s for $50 so I paid a better price here. My little one is afraid of it though because it moves on it’s own. Her dad was afraid of his fur baby when he was a kid so it’s probably genetic. I think it’s cool. It has a demo mode and regular.
customer_reviews.author: Shado Wuest

customer_reviews.title: Ship NEW, not used defective returns !
customer_reviews.text: Very MAD, UPSET, kinda PISSED OFF!! Expected a BRAND NEW never played with!! Received Dead on Arrival, meaning even after putting in brand new batteries, didn't work!
customer_reviews.author: A. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for small kids
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my niece who begged for this toy. Got her for Christmas and she works great. Entertains her for hours and she does sleep with her. She makes a small mechanical sound but it's only the gears. Not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Heap

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Batteries were dead when we got it so that ruined some of the fun right after opening. Works perfect and my kids love taking care of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. She fell in love with this. It’s adorable
customer_reviews.author: Ana Cartaya Huertas

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift. They are really nice, super cute. Great gift
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest price I could find on this item was here
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do as much as I thought it would but my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would freeze like a broken record if not sitting exactly on bottom
customer_reviews.text: I took out the demo batteries as soon as I opened it and then I turned it on and did as the instructions said but nothing happened at first and then it started to work but it would freeze up and click like a broken record if it wasn’t sitting exactly on its bottom and there was no room for error it was very cute though
customer_reviews.author: Ricci Mielke

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Batteries didnt work so I thought it was broke at first, but we replaced and it's awesome. Our son calls it his other fur real dinos gf lol because there is also a cute green, trex one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley White

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and my daughter loves it. I was expecting it to do a little more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but limited
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute but not good for really cuddling or playing with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun dinosaur toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this dinosaur toy, was the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Its Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is such a Cute Dino, its friendly looking. It makes baby dino noises, Stands, Sits, however.. It doesnt Walk, Crawl, Talk, Or even Eat the Little Food that it comes with.. It basically just sits there Or Stands There.. Cute to Have but not worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Lea N.

customer_reviews.title: It comes turned on
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute my 2 year old daughter absolutely loves this she takes it everywhere with her. It makes all kinds of noises it even farts an burps lol.
customer_reviews.author: Natanya

customer_reviews.title: Defective product- don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very very upset. I got this as a gift for my 4 year old for Christmas. So naturally i didnt open it upon receiving. First my order is "lost". Then i get a "replacement" that doesn't even work. I am cancelling my amazon account and will never buy from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: bree reed

customer_reviews.title: Excited to find it here
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at Walmart originally for 50 dollars, I decided to come home amd look on here first and I'm so glad I did. It was HALF the price. When my babygirl opened it she loved it. It's so cute and is a great quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lotta Kuchar

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but grand kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter wanted it, but it was really not a good gift. Best for 4 or 5 year old girl or boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard body but cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Deducted a star because the body is pretty hard but 5 year old loves playing with it. .... just isn't a "snuggling" type toy
customer_reviews.author: Thane

customer_reviews.title: Talking dino
customer_reviews.text: Cute happy little guy! My 6 month old gets so excited when the Dino “talks” to him!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha D

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 6 year old daughter. She loves it! It has held up to her and her 2 year old brother's play, which is impressive! Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad my daughter was so excited and when I put batteries in, it didn’t work!

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Our little granddaughter loved her new pet. A little scared at first but warmed up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany J Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t work the greatest
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old has the trex and has loved it for the last year. So I got my almost 2 year old this one. It doesn’t not seem to work as well. And it makes a weird buzzing noise. Super cute though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: My four year old daughter loves it I bought it to match Rex which I got for my son and they both play with them for hours
customer_reviews.author: Erika ross

customer_reviews.title: Buy the baby tRex instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought the baby t-Rex for my grandsons and this one for my granddaughter. The t-Rex is much more interactive and life like. We had so much fighting I had to make an emergency run to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute great gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy and cheaper then priced at Walmart! Had to buy my daughter loves it!

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite christmas present this year it doesn't do alot but it hops and my son adores it was worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Cute little dino
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves dinosaurs so it's fun for her to play pretend.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, make sure you have extra batteries.
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old is obsessed with all things dinosaur, so this was the perfect gift. We had to change the batteries when it came because it was completely dead, but other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: anthony pranzo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 yr old daughter for christmas because for her birthday we bought the T-rex one and loved it. She loves this just as much!

customer_reviews.title: So adorable! Perfect gift!!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and worth every penny. It’s super cute and my niece loves to interact with it. Such a perfect first that I have to buy 2 more more my twins.
customer_reviews.author: LUZ MONTEJANO

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter who is 20 months old. She loved it! It is soft and cuddly and it is easy for her to interact with it.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would do more. They really sell it but it took about five minutes for my six year to have run through the whole deal and she’s only played with it sparingly since.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and he absolutely loved it. Doesn’t let anyone play with it! Lol only down fall is I wished it did more interactive things. Other than that it’s an awesome gift!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Not soft at all but i didnt exspect it to be my 4 year old love to take care of his dino! He loves that he has a dino as a pet!

product_meta.title: furReal Hoppin’ Topper Interactive Plush Pet Toy, 35+ Sound-&-Motion Combinations, Age
product_meta.description: Hopping’ topper is an enthusiastic baby Dino who jumps with excitement when you wave your hand in front of him. (That's the signal for playtime, right?) as he jumps, he moves his head and makes lots of fun sounds – he's really into playtime! Pet him on his head, though, and he may just sit for you! Offer him one of his yummy-looking Dino treats – What’ll it be, some purple broccoli or a Caveman cookie? Then scoop him up and give him a great big hug – he's not just cool, he's cuddly, too!
feature_bullets: This baby Triceratops is always up for fun: The hopping’ topper interactive plush pet toy jumps with excitement when you wave you hand in front of him. This baby Dino sure is eager to play!
But he's sweet, too: pet him on his head and he'll sit for you. Good boy!
35+ sound-&-motion combinations: he moves his head and makes lots of cool noises
Feeding time: he comes with two Dino treats (purple broccoli and Caveman cookie)
Great gift for kids 4 and up: Just about any kid would have fun with this happy, hopping’ baby Dino

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars844 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
